Name: Align Engine Output
Description: Step 1, 2: Move the arrow and align the center line with the green grid.

Name: Calibrate Distributer
Description: Press the button below the meter in time to that the spinning black node connects with the device.

Name: Chart Course
Description: Tap and drag the ship along the grid line.

Name: Clean O2 Filter
Description: Tap and drag the floating leaves toward the hole.

Name: Divert Power
Locations: (1) Electrical. (2) Communications, Lower Engine, Navigation, O2, Reactor, Security, Shields, Upper Engine
Description: Step 1: Pull up the glowing lever on the device. Step 2: Flip the switch in the center.

Name: Empty Chute
Description: Step 1, 2: Pull and hold the lever.

Name: Empty Garbabe
Description: Step 1, 2: Pull and hold the lever.

Name: Fix Wiring
Locations: Admin, Cafeteria, Electrical, Navigation, Security, Storage
Description: Step 1, 2, 3: Connect wires of the same color.

Name: Fuel Engine
Locations: (1) Storage. (2) Lower Engine. (3) Storage. (4) Upper Engine
Description: Step 1, 3: Fill the gas container by pressing and holding the button. Step 2, 4: Fill the gas tank by pressing and holding the button.

Name: Inspect Sample
Description: Press the 'Start' button and wait. After the countdown ends, push the button below the red sample.

Name: Prime Shields
Description: Tap all the red cells to make all the cells white.

Name: Stabilize Steering
Description: Move the cursor to the center.

Name: Start Reactor
Description: Press the buttons in the exact sames order as the blue squares show on the left display.

Name: Submit Scan
Description: Stand on the platform and scan yourself.

Name: Swipe Card
Description: Use the card in the wallet and swipe it across the sensor.

Name: Unlock Manifolds
Description: Press the buttons in numerical order.

Name: Upload Data
Locations: (1) Cafeteria, Communications, Electrical, Navigation, Weapons. (2) Admin
Description: Step 1: Press the 'Download' button. Step 2: Press the 'Upload' button.
